title: "Welcome!"

This website accompanies the input talk *Data And Power Simulations*, which was part of the retreat of the Department of Social Neuroscience and Social Psychology at the University of Bern in June 2024.

The content of the input talk and the website is organized as follows:

1.  Presentation

2.  Hands-On Simulation

3.  Examples of Power Analyses

The source code for all presented files, apps, and data is available on [Emmanuel's GitHub](https://github.com/EGuizarRosales/DataAndPowerSimulations) and the website is available as a GitHub Page [here](https://eguizarrosales.github.io/DataAndPowerSimulations/).
